root.name: Days of Thunder: NASCAR Edition
root.description: PS3 ExclusivesJeff GordonJimmie JohnsonCarl EdwardsMark MartinTony StewartRyan NewmanDenny HamlinJuan Pablo MontoyaGreg BiffleKasey KahneKurt BuschBrian VickersCole Hauser's character Rowdy Burns acts as your crew chief; though, interestingly enough, he appears as a competitor too.The game has optional SIXAXIS support.
